title: Learn-cation Breathes New Life into Rural Jeju (25.05.21.) KCTV Jeju English News

tasks.task: Enroll in a social innovation semester program in a rural village.
subtasks: Choose a participating university and village for the semester.
Travel to the rural village (Jeju in this case) from one's campus.
Collaborate with local residents on community projects.
Develop local brands using regional specialties.
Plan tourism content to revitalize local businesses and attractions.
Engage in hands-on experiences outside the classroom.

tasks.task: Support and contribute to the revitalization of a rural village.
subtasks: Work with local community members on community improvement projects.
Contribute to the development of local tourism projects.
Promote agricultural products or services unique to the region.
Help revitalize businesses by generating interest through tourism.

tasks.task: Experience rural life and connect with local traditions.
subtasks: Immerse oneself in the local culture of the village.
Participate in local festivals or events if available.
Learn traditional farming or craftsmanship methods.
Engage in community meals or activities to build relationships.
Assess the success of developed local brands.
Evaluate the impact of tourism planning on village revitalization.
Monitor changes in community engagement and participation.

tasks.task: Understand the sustainability of university-community partnerships.
subtasks: Analyze the effectiveness of Learn-cation programs in combating regional depopulation.
Consider how long-term community collaboration can lead to sustainable development.
Evaluate the role of education institutions in rural revitalization efforts.
